TopicTitle: SCF Home base + 7/8/15 Spacecraft friday [Looking for you!]

Articles.Content:
I should be able to guys. It'll be a bit late but it'll still get done (hopefully). This must not die!

Happy Flying and see you tomorrow

YargJay9991

Coming soon! The Mostly Everything Edition! 

Last chance to post craft for this week's SCF! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Happy Flying!

YargJay9991

Thread should be up by 6:00 EST, and for some that'd be the early light of Saturday for some. Hopefully someone else will volunteer after me. Lots of posts to look through in such a short time ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif). Best of luck.
Make sure you've seen my Dragonfly, people seem to like it a lot.

I just posted my E asteroid retriever. It's in the Starcitizen replica thread for the Orion. It's the last vehicle. [The Orion Retriever x13 Plus](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/136120-StarCitizenReplicas-The-Orion!?p=2279215&viewfull=1#post2279215)
So what's the situation with maintainers? Is there anyone signed up to do next week?

I can do one again, but it seems a bit soon for me to do another. Sign me up for next week if nobody else can. But do add me to the reserve list. I just need a bit of notice because of my current school/work schedule. Mainly because I test as many of them as possible.

I can do it, and it would be fun, although it might be a bit late and I may need some help doing it right ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) (VERY nooby at forums)
I can probably do one over the Thanksgiving holidays, so put me down if that slot isn't already filled.
Throw me in and be sure to pm me on time if no other candidates have time.

> 
> I can do it, and it would be fun, although it might be a bit late and I may need some help doing it right ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) (VERY nooby at forums)

You can copy my SCF if you want, just change the words and pics ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

I can do one sometime, let me know when MRS.

Happy Flying

YargJay9991

> 
> I can do it, and it would be fun, although it might be a bit late and I may need some help doing it right ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) (VERY nooby at forums)

I will put you at the top of the list.

>

and I'll put you next.

>

Then you.

>

> 
> YargJay9991

If you don't mind, I'm going to put you at the bottom of the list, since you did one more recently than FlipNascar.
It would be fun to see Azimech host a SCF, he has been featured in a great many SCFs himself!

> 
> I will put you at the top of the list.
> and I'll put you next.
> 
> Then you.
> 
> If you don't mind, I'm going to put you at the bottom of the list, since you did one more recently than FlipNascar.

Sounds good! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Looking forward to it.

Happy Flying

YargJay9991

Ok, so I will start SF as soon as I get back from going out to dinner (just got home, and of course tonight is the ONE night my family is going out) ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif), Should be up in around 3-4 hours, so sorry if its a little late.

> 
> Ok, so I will start SF as soon as I get back from going out to dinner (just got home, and of course tonight is the ONE night my family is going out) ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif), Should be up in around 3-4 hours, so sorry if its a little late.

Don't worry! We look forward to it.
Azimech! You're up next!

There goes my social life next week.

;-)
Alright, Azimech, you're up tomorrow. I'll try to PM you tomorrow too.
I would be open to maintaining it a week if you would like.

I can possibly do a week as well, but my schedule has been very unpredictable as of late and will probably remain so until after Christmas. Go ahead and out me down wherever you need me, but have an alternate ready just in case I'm busy.

[quote name='CommanderSpock']I would be open to maintaining it a week if you would like.[/QUOTE]  

[quote name='pTrevTrevs']I can possibly do a week as well, but my schedule has been very unpredictable as of late and will probably remain so until after Christmas. Go ahead and out me down wherever you need me, but have an alternate ready just in case I'm busy.[/QUOTE]  

I'll add both of you.

OOOPS.  

^&%!  

Mea culpa guys.  

Totally forgot. I've been in my own universe the last couple of days. I'll make it up to you.  

I've arrived at my girlfriend's place, and won't come back until Sunday. The machines over here are not really able to review craft files in a meaningful manner.
